description:
CREX (formerly CRICKET EXCHANGE) is here to transform your Live Cricket Experience, knowing that Cricket is more than a game to you. From Live score updates & viral match highlights to fantasy analysis & exclusive cricket videos by cricket experts like Aakash Chopra, everything you need to know about your favourite sport is covered here in the most unique and engaging manner.


Why CREX is a viral choice for cricket lovers: 
- All international and domestic cricket matches
- Exclusive cricket videos and viral match highlights
- Every important happening in the cricket world
- Free fantasy tips and top picks
- Live ball-by-ball commentary
- Detailed scorecard with wicket description and partnership stats
- Insightful pre-match info and analysis
- Detailed rankings, points table, & records
- And a lot more

Follow Cricket Score & Updates of all tours & leagues including World Championship of Legends, The Hundred 2025, World Test Championship, Lanka Premier League 2025,  International League T20 2025, Champions Trophy, Women Ashes 2025, U19 Women's T20 World Cup 2025, India Women Tour of India 2025, Women's Premier League 2025, England vs New Zealand, Ireland Women Tour of India 2025, SA 20 League 2025, etc. with CREX.


Unique Features:
- Follow interesting insights and all trending updates
- Watch cricket content like short videos, stories, and so much more
- Get free expert fantasy cricket tips
- Get deep insights and improve your cricket analysis with graphs
- Read match summaries with trendy video highlights and more
- Find detailed information related to any active series
- Tap any player and get in-depth stats & analysis
- Switch between light and dark themes whenever you like
- Notifications for all live & upcoming matches, key events, & breaking news
- Find anything related to your favourite sport with Cricket Search
- Become a cricket guru by taking daily cricket quizzes

Catch all the action with a live line up of matches, insights, and exclusive videos all in one app.


Trending Cricket Content
Viral videos, trending stories & buzz-worthy series
Latest cricket news, match reports & breaking updates

Informative Tabs:


Home
- Cricket insights
- Team updates
- Live happenings
- Cricket stories, shorts, and reels

Matches
- All Live Matches
- Personalised Match info
- Exclusive cricket videos
- Upcoming and Finished matches

Series
- Complete series info and stats
- Points table
- Top Performing Players and Teams Squads
- Trending news and videos

Fixtures
- Day-wise, Series-wise and Team-wise matches
- Matches are further classified into International, T20, ODI, Test, League and Women
- Follow your favourite teams

News
- Latest Cricket News & viral updates
- Articles, Breaking News, & much more

More
- Men’s Ranking
- Women’s ranking
- Choose your preferred language- available in English, Hindi, & Bengali

Details about the Premium version:
Yes, we’ve got a premium subscription and it’s as smooth as it gets. Go Premium for an ad-free experience and enjoy uninterrupted cricket coverage like never before.

Subscribe to the Monthly Plan
Title: Monthly Plan
Length: Auto-renews every month
Price: ₹99/month

Other available plans:
₹199/quarter (billed every 3 months)
₹499/year (billed annually)

Cricbuzz - Experience cricket like never before with World’s no.1 Cricket app. Get extensive coverage of all International cricket, ICC World Cup, IPL, BBL, CPL, PSL, T20 Blast, domestic cricket and hundreds of cricket tournaments across the world.

* Fast Scores & Commentary: Stay updated with super-fast scores and immersive ball-by-ball commentary.
* Live Streaming of IPL, World Cup & More: Enjoy live streaming of IPL, World Cup, India and Australia Home Series, BBL, PSL, and other international cricket matches for an immersive viewing experience. [Available in select countries only. Not available in India]
* Live Match Notifications: Never miss a moment with live match alerts and breaking news.
* Latest News & Editorials: Stay informed with the latest updates and insightful editorials.
* Exclusive Premium Content: Get access to premium editorials and original video content with a subscription
* Upcoming Match Schedules: Plan your viewing effortlessly with upcoming match schedules.
* Rankings, Stats & Records: Explore cricket's intricacies with comprehensive data at your fingertips.
* Special content for major tournaments like ICC Cricket World Cup, T20 World Cup, IPL, Champions Trophy, WPL etc.,

Whether you are a seasoned follower of the game or a new fan Cricbuzz app has you covered.

Live Cricket TV Sports is a cricket app that allows you to watch live matches score, Schedule and analysis, and keep track of upcoming matches. Whether you're a beginner or an expert, Live Cricket TV Sports has something for everyone.

Live Cricket TV Sports is the perfect app for cricket fans of all levels.
This is a Live Cricket TV Sports and the cricket-related latest update and schedules app.

Welcome to Live Cricket Score, the ultimate app for every cricket enthusiast! Stay connected to the world of cricket with our comprehensive features that bring the game closer to you than ever before. Whether you're a casual fan or a die-hard cricket lover, Live Cricket Score is designed to keep you updated with every ball and every match. Here’s what you can look forward to:

Main Features:

1. Live Cricket Score
Never miss a moment of the action with real-time updates on live cricket scores. Our fast and accurate live score updates ensure you are always in the know about every run, wicket, and milestone.

2. Live Cricket Match Details
Dive deep into the details of every live cricket match. From player statistics and team line-ups to ball-by-ball commentary and detailed match summaries, get all the information you need at your fingertips.

3. Upcoming Match Schedules
Plan your cricket viewing with ease by checking the schedules of upcoming matches. Stay informed about the dates, times, and venues of all the exciting fixtures lined up, so you never miss a game.

4. Point Table
Here you can view all types of point table like ODI, T20 and test matches.

Thrilling experience to watch every cricket match, league match, Domestic and International Match.

Download it today and start enjoying all the features it has to offer!

Stumps - The Cricket Scorer is an Easy-To-Use cricket scoring app for all kinds of matches and tournaments. Be a tournament organiser, club cricketer or amateur cricketer, and take your career to the next level by using the Stumps cricket scoring app. It will make you feel like you are no less than an international player.

# It is a digital scoring platform to manage your cricket tournaments with ease like a pro and broadcast your matches online to watch the live score.
# This is the best scoring app which allows you to manage all your organisation's matches and tournaments under a club and gives you the stats of players and teams with a great user interface.
# All the features in the Stumps - The Cricket Scorer are completely FREE.


KEY FEATURES :
# Watch cricket live score with the ball-by-ball update of any match at zero delays.
# Graphical charts - Wagon wheel, Over comparison and Runs comparison.
# Automated voice commentary.
# Scoring can be continued offline even when the network is interrupted.
# Edit and replace any player on the scorecard.
# Share options as an image and pdf.
# Matches Settings - Total wickets, Last man stands, Turn off Wide/No Ball extras, No. of balls per over and more.
# Follow international cricket news.

PLAYERS PROFILE:
# Player Overview - Career statistics, Recent form, Yearly Stats, Best against teams and Awards.
# Statistics are categorised based on the match format.
# Batting Insights and Bowling Insights with charts.
# Add past scores to your profile and build your cricket career.
# One-To-One player comparison
# Filter options include Match Formats, Ball Type, Year-Wise, Original/Added scores.
# Match-Wise Stats helps you to analyze your performance in each of the matches you played.
# Add your Jersey number, Playing role, Batting Style and Bowling Style.
# Share your profile statistics as an image along with your profile link.

TEAMS:
# Team Overview - Win/Loss Ratio, Top Performers, Recent Scores and Wickets taken.
# Role-wise player list (Batters, Bowlers and All-Rounders).
# Assign Captain, Vice-Captain and Wicket-Keeper for your team.
# Team Statistics include Win/Loss percent, Bat First/Second Stats, Toss Stats.
# Team Players Stats - More than 20 stats including MVP.
# Filter options include Match Format, Ball Type, Year-Wise and Player Stats Type.
# Team comparison and Head-To-Head.
# Add social media links of your team.

MATCHES:
# Match Summary, Scorecard, Partnership, Fall Of Wickets, Ball By Ball and many more like international matches.
# Charts like Wagon Wheel, Over Comparison and Runs Comparison
# Super Stars - A real-time rankings of players during matches based on the MVP points system.
# Share match summary and scheduled match as a graphical image along with the match link.
# Custom settings - Total wickets, Last man stands, Turn off Wide/No Ball extras, Number of balls per over, Max 8 balls per over including extras (for junior cricket), Add wide balls to batsman, Add wide runs to batsman, Add no ball extras to batsman
# Export your match as a pdf.

TOURNAMENTS:
# Create and manage your cricket league or tournament.
# Points with the Net Run Rate (NRR) will be updated automatically after each group stage match of the tournament.
# Edit points table to add customized points.
# Statistics of the tournament will be updated automatically.
# Check the points table possibilities for any team to achieve or retain a position in a tournament.
# Share points table as a graphical image with the tournament link.

ORGANISATIONS/CLUBS:
# Manage your cricket tournament and matches under one suite known as Club.
# It is an organisation management feature which can have multiple admins.
# It has unique features like Hall of Fame, Season and Quarterly based statistics of the players.
# Add social media links and website of your organisation or club to attract more visitors to your pages or website.
__

For assistance and queries.
Email: support@stumpsapp.com
Website: stumpsapp.com

Ten Sports is a Pakistani sports television channel. It was launched in 2002 and has since become the most popular sports channel in Pakistan. The channel is dedicated to broadcasting a wide range of sports events, including cricket, football, hockey, tennis, and other popular sports.

Ten Sports has the exclusive broadcasting rights for major sports events such as the Pakistan Super League (PSL), International Cricket Council (ICC) events, Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) events, and various domestic and international sports leagues.
Ten Sports channel also features various sports analysis programs, expert opinions, and talk shows to keep its viewers up-to-date with the latest sports news and happenings. Ten Sports broadcasts live cricket tv 24 hours a day, and its programs can be accessed through cable and satellite networks across Pakistan and some other countries.

Not just live scores, this app also provides live match toss and playing 11 updates, news updates and you will also be able to check upcoming Cricket matches schedule, browse upcoming Cricket series of team India, and all the other International Cricket teams and T20 leagues schedules.

I hope you like our efforts and this app is add value in your mobile apps collection & you no need to another app for sports because this app is the one solution app of sports entertainment.

CricHeroes is the ultimate cricket scoring app to digitally score your local cricket matches, live stream them, and organise tournaments like a professional.
Join millions of passionate cricketers using the #1 Cricket Scorer App to make grassroots cricket world-class!

Live Scoring & Match Analytics:
Broadcast your live cricket scores ball by ball and get an international-grade scorecard — completely FREE!
Enjoy detailed cricket analytics like Wagon Wheel, Manhattan, Worm, Run Rate, MVP, and more.
Let your friends and family follow live scores, commentary, and full scorecards in real time.

Live Streaming & AI Highlights:
Live stream your matches and tournaments just like professional games using only a mobile phone or tools like OBS, VMix, or other broadcast software.
Get automatic AI-generated highlights of your matches after every game.
Relive your best cricket moments and share them instantly with your friends, teammates, and followers.

Your Cricket Profile & Recognition:
Build your world-class cricket profile with in-depth batting and bowling stats — just like the pros!
Earn badges, awards, and leaderboard rankings for your on-field achievements.  Check your and your team’s ranking in city, state, and national leaderboards and celebrate top performers in your area.  CricHeroes Awards – The only global grassroots cricket awards! Perform consistently to win one.

Use CricInsights to analyse performances, track your form, understand your strengths, and improve your game.

Find & Connect with the Cricket Community:
Find cricket teams, opponents, players, umpires, and grounds easily for your next match.
Find Cricketers – Discover players from your contacts and follow their journey. Cheer for them, and celebrate their top performances.
Smart Search – Search players, tournaments, teams, clubs, grounds, and academies using voice search.

For Tournament Organisers:
Run your cricket tournaments professionally and completely FREE with CricHeroes!
Create a beautiful tournament page with leaderboard, points table, schedule, boundary tracker, and live scoring.
Smart Auto-Schedule Generator – Generate tournament fixtures in seconds.  Smart NRR Calculator – Know exactly what your team needs to reach the next stage.

CricHeroes Store:
Buy exclusive CricHeroes-branded cricket apparel and gear at unbeatable prices.  Get premium-quality products trusted by players worldwide.

Cricket Feed & Community:
Stay connected with the world of cricket! Read about rules, education, trivia, quizzes, polls, and stories — all in one place.
Register as a scorer, umpire, or commentator and get more match opportunities in your area.  PRO Club – An exclusive community for CricHeroes PRO users to connect, share, and grow together.

Cricket Associations:
Follow official matches and tournaments of 50+ ICC Associations and 23+ BCCI State Associations.
Track the journey of aspiring cricketers and appreciate grassroots cricket talent.

CricHeroes is built by passionate cricketers, for cricketers and fans around the world.
With 40M+ users, 10M+ matches scored, and a 4.7+ rating, CricHeroes is the No. 1 FREE Cricket Scoring App globally.

Let us know your feedback and suggestions to improve the app. We are just one phone call away at +918141665555.

FASTEST CRICKET SCORE APP IN THE WORLD

Watch Multiple LIVE Matches at the same time 

Are you a global cricket fan? Do you despise going out and not being able to watch live cricket matches score updates? Do not be worried! Our Cricket Live Score App will quickly solve this problem that you have with watching cricket. This app contains cricket ball-to-ball live scores, cricket player insights, Player Runs, and more. 

Widest cricket coverage across the world including IPL, PSL, BPL, BBL, CPL, County Championship, Ranji Trophy, Sheffield shield.

Cricket Live Score App, Cricket Live App, Cricket Score App, Cricket App, Cricket Live, Cricket Live Match Today Online, Cricket Live Streaming App, Cricket Live Streaming, Cricket Streaming App, Cricket Ball To Ball Score App, T20 World Live Score, Cricket Live Today, Cricket Live Match, Cricket Live Score, Cricket Live IPL, Cricket Live News, Cricket Live 2022
Watching cricket on our brand-new Cricket Live Score app will be simple and will deliver a seamless experience across the web and mobile platforms. 

Watch the latest World Cup Match Live Score Today, ODI/One Day Match Live Score Today, Test Match Live Score Today.

The scoreboard never provides the whole picture. 

Live Cricket TV: Live TV Score key Features
- Batsmen live stats - Runs Scored, Balls Faced, Fours, Sixes, Strike Rate.
- Know how many runs scored in the power-plays.
- You will get to know both teams live Cricket scores of both innings (the team's total scored runs and wickets fallen with total overs).
- Bowlers live stats - Overs, Maiden Overs, Runs Conceded, Wickets, Economy Rate.
- Also, see overs of both innings, Extra Runs Conceded (wide, leg byes, byes, no balls), Current Run Rate, and Required Run Rate.
- You will get to know both teams Batsmen and Bowlers live stats.
- Fall of wickets of both teams.
- Know the player of the match of the live match.
- Know how many catches dropped and run-outs missed in the live match.

You can Watch Live Cricket Score of following tournament on Live Cricket TV: Live Tv Score

Let’s imagine yourself as a karate & martial art master that is the ultimate king fighter in Kung Fu karate fighting. Karate is an ancient martial art built around self-defense that originates from Japan and China. Play the toughest & real kick fighting game app against world undisputed fighting champions ever. The game offers a real training game app specially developed for fans who love to play PRO karate action games. Karate & martial art fighting become extremely popular worldwide and have many fighting variations. This Karate Training game will help you to learn Karate for free through your handy IOS device.


In this game, there are blockage techniques to defend yourself from enemy attacks. Your opponents use various training styles including taekwondo, Muay Thai, Kung Fu, boxing, and others, show your top-level training to overcome all of your opponents with the power. Keep an eye on every move of your enemy that is fighting with you. Take timely decisions, attack the enemy with punches and kicks at the proper time and block enemy attack using accuracy and speed in your actions. Quickness is key to win the hand to hand fights.


Go toe-to-toe against 30+ bone-crushing fighters from Bangkok, Korea, Thailand, china, japan, and Singapore. Advanced animation and stunning 3D graphics bring the real Karate experience to your hand, while intuitive touchscreen controls make jab, hook, and uppercut feel natural and fun. Learn Karate for all levels and easy for free with this game app. Use your blockage techniques to defend yourself against your rivals. Look out for every move of your enemy and strike first to beat ‘em. Take decisions on time about utilizing your kickboxing moves to show who is a master in this martial arts fighting game. It is a full action-packed game for fans to play and enjoy. 


Learn how to fight hand to hand without any weapons, and by using your karate kicks. Do not hesitate if you are not a PRO because training mode will help you to get trained. You can select a fighter of your own choice and fight with your unique styles. Win all the matches to be promoted to a legends tournament. Get multiple rewards for winning each level. Get ready to battle against the world’s most powerful fighters. This Kung Fu karate game is for professionals who believe they can win against dangerous opponents. This game has awesome background music that will keep you engaged and energized throughout the game. 


Prove yourself by showing your ninja fighting move and earn points for each win. You can upgrade your fighter’s power, speed, and accuracy of their punches in the game. Strike hard and take your rivals down before they get a chance to hit you. Wrestle them to the end so that you can defeat them. Use your bone-crushing techniques to crush ‘em all. Do not lag in taking action because timing is the key to win this game. Use quick reflexes and special moves, unleash fierce punch boxing and combos, beat all fighters, and become the king of karate now. Advanced animation and stunning 3D graphics bring the real Karate experience to your hand. Easily learn Karate for all levels for free with this fun game. It is quite addictive, once you start playing you will not be able to miss out on this ultimate battle.
